description: This tart is an elegant take on cheese and onion pie and makes a delicious lunch or entree.
keywords: Goats Cheese, Spinach & Red Onion Tart
name: Goats Cheese, Spinach & Red Onion Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the goats cheese and spinach mix within the border, top with red onions and bake for 20 minutes until puffed and golden.
